Fred Nuamah (onye amụrụ Frederick Kwaku Nuamah; November 5, 1975) bụ onye Ghana na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya n'ihe nkiri a kpọrọ The Game
Ọ bụ onye guzobere nakwa onye isi oche nke Ghana Movie Awards & Ghana TV series Awards, ihe ngosi onyinye kwa afọ nke na-amata ịdị mma na ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Ghana.
A mụrụ Nuamah na Accra, ọ sikwa Ada na Obuasi, obodo dị na Ashanti Region Southern part of Ghana.
Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama mgbe ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Matters of the Heart na 1993
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nkwado na ihe nkiri gụnyere The Prince Bride, Heart of Men, Material Girl na 4 Play
N'afọ 2010, Nuamah pụtara na The Game, nke Abdul Salam Mumuni duziri.
Nuamah rụrụ ọrụ na Amakye na Dede nke gosipụtara na Silverbird Cinemas na Accra na Machị 26, 2016.
Na 1 Jenụwarị 2009, Nuamah guzobere Ghana Movie Awards ebe ọ na-ejide ọkwa onye isi oche.
